mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (reporter, subject_type, subject_id, report_type, report_reason) VALUES (#{reporter}, #{subjectType}, #{subjectId}, #{reportType}, #{reportReason})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE subject_id = #{subjectId} AND report_type IN ('SPAM', 'ABUSE', 'SEXUAL_CONTENT', 'IMPERSONATION_OR_FRAUD')
